verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: is] attending a reception for Gold Star families at the White House on Monday , marking her first public appearance since her surgery . No photographs have yet to emerge .

[ARG0: Melania Trump] is [V: attending] [ARG1: a reception for Gold Star families at the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , [ARGM-ADV: marking her first public appearance since her surgery . No photographs have yet to emerge] .

Melania Trump is attending a reception for Gold Star families at the White House on Monday , marking her first public appearance since her surgery . No photographs [V: have] yet to emerge .
